Text: Oh my gawd you guys, is it really too hard to seed?
Also, thanks for the quick release, Sceneline!

Yeah, maddog, it is too hard to seed.  I don't download sceneline releases when there's any other option, and I don't reseed any of sceneline's releases, because watching it and reseeding it means I have to give up 2x the space for each episode, since it's in .rar form.  I recombine the .rar files, and immediately dump them and the torrent, and only keep the finished product.
